ageDesc: Calculate your age and next birthday based on your birth date.
areaDesc: Convert between area units like square meters, hectares, and acres.
bmiDesc: Find out your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on height and weight.
dataDesc: Convert between Bit, Byte, and other digital data units.
dateDesc: Easily calculate the difference in days, months, and years between two dates.
discountDesc: Calculate the new price and your savings based on the discount rate.
financeDesc: Plan your loan installments or investment returns.
currencyDesc: Make instant conversions with current exchange rates.
lengthDesc: Convert length units like meters, miles, and inches.
massDesc: Perform operations between mass units like kilograms, pounds, and ounces.
numeralDesc: Convert between Binary, Octal, Decimal, and Hexadecimal number systems.
speedDesc: Convert speed units like km/h, mph, and knots.
tempDesc: Convert between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin temperature units.
timeDesc: Calculate time units like seconds, minutes, hours, and days.
volumeDesc: Convert volume measures like liters, gallons, and cubic meters.
calculatorDesc: Basic arithmetic: addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
dashboardHeroDesc: Modern toolset for your daily tasks, engineering calculations, and data conversions.
name: Name
subject: Subject
weWillReturn: We will get back to you as soon as possible.
dataCollectionDesc: When you visit our website, anonymous data such as IP address and browser type may be collected to improve user experience. Personal information like name and email is collected only with your consent via contact forms or newsletter subscriptions and is not shared with third parties.
cookiesDesc: We use cookies to improve our service quality and analyze site traffic. Additionally, partners like Google Analytics and AdSense may place cookies on your browser. You can change your cookie preferences at any time through your browser settings.
privacyContactDesc: For any questions regarding our privacy policy or the processing of your personal data, you can reach us using the form on our contact page.
footerDesc: All the calculation tools you need in daily life, finance, and education in one place. Fast, accurate, and free.
newsletterDesc: Be the first to know about new calculation tools.
currencyHeroDesc: Convert currencies with real-time market data.
searchPlaceholder: Search for a tool or calculation...
contactMetaDesc: Contact us for suggestions, complaints, and cooperation.
contactHeroDesc: Did you find a bug or do you have a suggestion for a new calculation tool? You can send it to us by filling out the form below.
termsMetaDesc: Terms of use and legal warnings for Calc Master website.
termsKeywords: terms of use, terms of service, disclaimer
acceptanceDesc: By using this website (Calc Master), you are deemed to have accepted the terms specified below. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use the site.
serviceNatureDesc: The calculation tools offered on our site (Finance, BMI, Time, etc.) are for informational purposes only. They do not constitute financial or medical advice. Please consult an expert before making final decisions.
disclaimerDesc: Calc Master does not guarantee 100% accuracy of calculation results. The site management cannot be held responsible for damages arising from incorrect calculations caused by software errors or data entries.
changesDesc: Site management reserves the right to change these terms without prior notice.
aboutIntro: Calc Master is a comprehensive digital platform established to provide practical, fast, and reliable solutions to the complex calculation needs of modern life. We serve a wide range of areas from financial planning to health data, academic calculations to daily practical conversions. Our goal is to ensure that our users use their time most efficiently and help them reach accurate results instantly without dealing with complex formulas.
missionDesc: Our mission is to democratize access to information and make it understandable for everyone by making the best use of the opportunities offered by technology. In the constantly evolving digital world, we aim to be a reference source that supports our users' decision-making processes, makes their lives easier, and that they can always trust. Acting with the principles of innovation and user-centricity, we constantly update our tools and develop new solutions suitable for your needs.
heroSubtitle: All the tools you need, from finance to health, education to engineering.
footerSlogan: Hundreds of calculation tools to make your life easier, all in one place.
whyUsDesc: Why should you choose Calc Master? Because we prioritize user experience above all else. We offer an environment that everyone can use comfortably with our simple and understandable design, away from complex interfaces. Our calculation algorithms are meticulously prepared using the most up-to-date data and scientific formulas. In addition, we attach great importance to your data privacy and apply the highest level of security standards to protect your personal information.
